name: Arvia Laboratories Testing
description:
Download the Windows version if the game or character movement is slow. Low fps is common issue with Gamemaker studio 1 HTML5 build. Hello, subjectt #6432.
Welcome to Arvia Laboratories! You go through series of test chambers where you use your own body to keep buttons pushed to open doors or use it as stairs to get to high placed areas.

To enter fullscreen press the button in right bottom corner of the game, but Gamemaker can't rescale HTML5 games, so it will stay in the very same resolution.

This game was made for Wowie Jam 3.0 2021

You can also download a Windows build from list of version below.
Windows builds mostly have better FPS than HTML5 builds.

Trello board with new possible features bug fixes and other stuff
